in_brief: Dr. R. Latha is an Assistant Professor(SG), Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology. She has more than 17 years of experience in teaching. Her research focuses on Recommender Systems, Information Retrieval, Machine Learning and Data privacy. The title of her doctoral thesis is "Collaborative Recommender Systems with User Preference Mining Approaches". She is currently doing research in the area of Manifold Learning techniques. She is a member of Computer Society of India and ACM.
